```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(htmltools)
```
<br>
```{r}
thumbnail <- function(title, img, href, caption = TRUE) {
  div(class = "col-sm-6",
      a(class = "thumbnail", title = title, href = href,
        img(src = img),
        div(class = if (caption) "caption",
            if (caption) title)
      )
  )
}
```

```{r}
thumbnail("Psychopharmacology", "images/hal-gatewood-neuron.jpeg",
          "")
thumbnail("Pharmpharmacology Anki", "images/danilo-alvesd-pill.jpg",
          "")
thumbnail("Rookie Researcher", "images/dg_flavicon-dom-logo-550x550-NoBackground.png",
          "rookie_researcher.html")
```
